start: ^Oh, hello! Elon told me about you! Welcome!
who_are_you: ^My name's Jesper. I am an engineer here on the station. My job is to ensure all systems work as intended. During my work I created some interesting things that may be useful to you. I can offer you them for a modest fee.
^Can't I get them for free? We're on the mission, after all...
fee: ^I'm interested in little gold ingots from the Moon and Mars. If you find any - bring them to me and we will see what we can do.
deny: ^I'am afraid not. You see, it's not that I`m not willing to help you, but I need something from that planets....for scientific purposes. See? We can help each other.
^All right then. So what do you want in return?
